name: Skyline Luxury Apartment
description: Experience high-end living in this 3-bedroom luxury apartment located in the heart of Gulshan. Featuring a panoramic skyline view, Italian marble flooring, smart lighting, and 24/7 security. The apartment includes a private balcony, gym access, underground parking, and a modern kitchen with premium fittings. Perfect for urban professionals or small families looking for style and comfort.

name: Green Valley Villa
description: This elegant 5-bedroom villa is surrounded by lush greenery and serene landscapes, offering a peaceful lifestyle in Bashundhara. The property features a private swimming pool, landscaped garden, home theater, and a spacious terrace for outdoor dining. Built with modern architecture and sustainable materials, this villa provides luxury and eco-conscious living in one package.

name: Riverside Dream Home
description: Wake up to the sound of the river and enjoy sunset views from your private balcony. This 2-story home offers open living spaces, a rooftop terrace, and large windows for natural light. Located beside the scenic Karnaphuli River, this home combines traditional charm with modern finishes — ideal for those who love nature without leaving the city behind.

name: City Heights Studio
description: A compact yet sophisticated studio apartment designed for young professionals. It includes a modular kitchen, balcony with city views, high-speed internet, and concierge service. The building offers shared amenities such as a rooftop lounge, gym, and café — making it a perfect blend of comfort and convenience in a busy urban area.

name: Seaside View Apartment
description: Enjoy the sound of waves and the smell of the ocean from your own private balcony. This 4-bedroom seaside apartment features an open-plan layout, large windows, marble bathrooms, and smart climate control. Residents get access to an infinity pool, fitness center, and private beach area. A rare find for those seeking tranquility with luxury.

name: Urban Nest Condo
description: A modern 2-bedroom condo featuring smart home automation, secure entry, and rooftop pool access. Located in a premium area of Uttara, this property includes an underground parking spot, shared lounge, and co-working space. Ideal for couples or small families who appreciate technology-driven comfort and stylish interiors.

name: Hilltop Retreat House
description: Escape the city and enjoy the peace of nature with this hilltop retreat located in Bandarban. The property features a panoramic mountain view, wooden interiors, fireplace, and large outdoor deck. Perfect for a vacation home or Airbnb rental, it offers privacy, natural beauty, and modern comfort — all in one exclusive spot.

name: Downtown Commercial Space
description: A premium commercial property located in the business hub of Motijheel. Suitable for offices, showrooms, or co-working setups. The space offers modern glass interiors, high ceilings, conference rooms, and 24-hour generator backup. With great road connectivity and visibility, it’s perfect for brands looking for a strong presence.

name: Eco Haven Duplex
description: Built with sustainability in mind, this eco-friendly duplex features solar panels, rainwater harvesting, and energy-efficient insulation. The home includes spacious bedrooms, a green rooftop, and a smart lighting system. Located in a calm neighborhood, this property is ideal for families who value comfort and environmental responsibility.

name: Golden Tower Penthouse
description: An ultra-luxury penthouse situated atop the iconic Golden Tower. This property includes 4 bedrooms, private rooftop garden, jacuzzi, walk-in closets, and exclusive elevator access. With breathtaking skyline views of Dhanmondi Lake and premium interior finishes, it represents the finest standard of city living for elite buyers.
